column2: I ordered a glass of sparkling wine with my lunch and the waitress asked to see my ID but didn't do so for the other person in my party. I think it goes w/o saying that if you card one person in the party
column3: you need to card the whole party. But on top of that
column4: as I was reaching for my ID
column6: "HMM YOU MUST BE A '94.... OH YOU'RE A '95
column8: caps to exemplify loud tone).. Like
column9: thank you for announcing my age to the restaurant.
